1329900.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Tokenpack 15 - Heroes 4
1329900.description:
Jans Tokenpack 15 - Heroes 4

My fourth token pack that consists of heroes to portray your character as either a character portrait, or a digital miniature.
15 unique tokens with multiple variations in colors and weapons. 48 tokens total.
May they serve you well!
Including:
  • Battleforged Barbarian
  • Battleforged Goliath
  • Battleforged Fighter
  • Battleforged Monk
  • Battleforged Ranger
  • Battleforged Rogue
  • Battleforged Wizard
  • Human Male Druid
  • Human Male Monster Hunter
  • Human Female Figher
  • Knight
  • Elven Female Druid
  • Elven Female Ranger
  • Elven Female Wizard
  • Wukong the Monkey King
  • Tiefling Female Rogue
Converted by:
Jan Loos
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
